description: Match Outcome
if the match is a win
Competition - Number next to competition states which level in the country's league pyramid this league occupies.
Round or Phase of Competition
Date listed is local to the match
match start time hour
if the day of the game is on a weekend
if the game is at home
Goals For
Goals Against
Shots Total (Does not include PKs)
Shots on target (Does not include PKs)
Percentage of shots that are on target (Does not include PKs)
Goals per shot
Average distance in yards from goal of all shots taken
Shots from free kicks
Penalty Kicks Made
Penalty Kicks Attempted
Expected Goals - xG totals include penalty kicks but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted). - Provided by StatsBomb.
Non-Penalty Expected Goals - Provided by StatsBomb.
Non-Penalty Expected Goals per shot - Provided by StatsBomb.
Goals minus Expected Goals - xG totals include penalty kicks but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted). - Provided by StatsBomb.
Non-Penalty Goals minus Non-Penalty Expected Goals - xG totals include penalty kicks but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted). - Provided by StatsBomb.
Number of times a player touched the ball. Note: Receiving a pass then dribbling then sending a pass counts as one touch
Touches in defensive penalty area
Touches in defensive penalty area
Touches in defensive 1/3
Touches in middle 1/3
Touches in attacking 1/3
Touches in attacking penalty area
Live-ball touches. Does not include corner kicks free kicks throw-ins kick-offs goal kicks or penalty kicks
Dribbles Completed Successfully
Dribbles Attempted
Percentage of Dribbles Completed Successfully
Number of Players Dribbled Past
Number of times a player dribbled the ball through an opposing player's legs
Number of times the player controlled the ball with their feet
total distance in yards a player moved the ball while controlling it with their feet in any direction
Progressive Distance - total distance a player moved the ball while controlling it with their feet towards the opponent's goal
Carries that move the ball towards the opponent's goal at least 5 yards or any carry into the penalty area. Excludes carries from the defending 40% of the pitch
Carries that enter the 1/3 of the pitch closest to the goal
Carries into the 18-yard box
Number of times a player failed when attempting to gain control of a ball
Number of times a player loses control of the ball after being tackled by an opposing player. Does not include attempted dribbles
Number of times a player was the target of an attempted pass
Number of times a player successfully received a pass
Passes Received Percentage - Percentage of time a player successfully received a pass

Progressive Passes Received - Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch
Passes Completed
Passes Attempted
Pass Completion Percentage
Total distance in yards that completed passes have traveled in any direction
Progressive Distance - Total distance in yards that completed passes have traveled towards the opponent's goal. Note: Passes away from opponent's goal are counted as zero progressive yards.
Passes Completed - Passes between 5 and 15 yards
Passes Completed - Passes between 15 and 30 yards
Passes Completed - Passes longer than 30 yards
Assists
xG Assisted
Passes that directly lead to a shot (assisted shots)
Completed passes that enter the 1/3 of the pitch closest to the goal Not including set pieces
Completed passes into the 18-yard box Not including set pieces
Completed crosses into the 18-yard box Not including set pieces

Progressive Passes - Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch
Number of players tackled
Tackles in which the tackler's team won possession of the ball
Tackles in defensive 1/3
Tackles in middle 1/3
Tackles in attacking 1/3
Number of dribblers tackled
Number of times dribbled past plus number of tackles
Percentage of dribblers tackled
Number of times dribbled past by an opposing player
Number of times applying pressure to opposing player who is receiving carrying or releasing the ball
Number of times the squad gained possession withing five seconds of applying pressure
Successful Pressure Percentage
Number of times applying pressure to opposing player who is receiving carrying or releasing the ball in the defensive 1/3
Number of times applying pressure to opposing player who is receiving carrying or releasing the ball in the middle 1/3
Number of times applying pressure to opposing player who is receiving carrying or releasing the ball in the attacking 1/3
Number of times blocking the ball by standing in its path
Number of times blocking a shot by standing in its path
Number of times blocking a shot that was on target by standing in its path
Number of times blocking a pass by standing in its path
Interceptions
Clearances
Mistakes leading to an opponent's shot
